thread.title: Mail the force be with you: Star Wars stamps finally issued by Royal Mail - Movies
thread.title_full: Mail the force be with you: Star Wars stamps finally issued by Royal Mail - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Sam Warner
title: Mail the force be with you: Star Wars stamps finally issued by Royal Mail - Movies
text: Fancy sending post with Han Solo or Darth Vader on the envelope? Of course you do.Royal Mail has issued their official Star Wars stamps to mark the release of new film The Force Awakens. © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm The 18-stamp collection was unveiled in September, but they've only just gone on sale in post offices and online. © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm The limited edition stamps feature artwork by British artist Malcolm Tween, who was commissioned to draw nine characters from the original trilogy, and three from the new one. © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm The 12 characters include Kylo Ren, Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Boba Fett and Obi-Wan Kenobi. The remaining six stamps are vehicles from the series, including the Millennium Falcon and a TIE fighter. © Royal Mail / Lucasfilm The stamps debut just a few short days after THAT Star Wars trailer, which racked up 128 million views in just 24 hours.Star Wars: The Force Awakens makes its offici.
